item.description: Algorithms and Competitive Programming. After a two-year break from competitive programming, I’m diving back in. My goal this time around is more than just solving problems; I want to refresh my knowledge, sharpen my problem-solving skills, and become a more articulate and thoughtful programmer. In the past, I often solved problems in bulk, rarely taking time for post-solution reflection or documentation. While that approach boosted my problem count, I believe it hindered my long-term progress and deeper understanding.
